004
005package edu.wpi.first.apriltag.jni;
006
007import edu.wpi.first.util.RuntimeLoader;
008import java.io.IOException;
009import java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicBoolean;
010import org.opencv.core.Mat;
011
012public class AprilTagJNI {
013  static boolean libraryLoaded = false;
014
015  static RuntimeLoader<AprilTagJNI> loader = null;
016
017  public static class Helper {
018    private static AtomicBoolean extractOnStaticLoad = new AtomicBoolean(true);
019
020    public static boolean getExtractOnStaticLoad() {
021      return extractOnStaticLoad.get();
022    }
023
024    public static void setExtractOnStaticLoad(boolean load) {
025      extractOnStaticLoad.set(load);
026    }
027  }
028
029  static {
030    if (Helper.getExtractOnStaticLoad()) {
031      try {
032        loader =
033            new RuntimeLoader<>(
034                "apriltagjni", RuntimeLoader.getDefaultExtractionRoot(), AprilTagJNI.class);
035        loader.loadLibrary();
036      } catch (IOException ex) {
037        ex.printStackTrace();
038        System.exit(1);
039      }
040      libraryLoaded = true;
041    }
042  }
043
044  // Returns a pointer to a apriltag_detector_t
045  public static native long aprilTagCreate(
046      String fam, double decimate, double blur, int threads, boolean debug, boolean refine_edges);
047
048  // Destroy and free a previously created detector.
049  public static native void aprilTagDestroy(long detector);
050
051  private static native Object[] aprilTagDetectInternal(
052      long detector,
053      long imgAddr,
054      int rows,
055      int cols,
056      boolean doPoseEstimation,
057      double tagWidth,
058      double fx,
059      double fy,
060      double cx,
061      double cy,
062      int nIters);
063
064  // Detect targets given a GRAY frame. Returns a pointer toa zarray
065  public static DetectionResult[] aprilTagDetect(
066      long detector,
067      Mat img,
068      boolean doPoseEstimation,
069      double tagWidth,
070      double fx,
071      double fy,
072      double cx,
073      double cy,
074      int nIters) {
075    return (DetectionResult[])
076        aprilTagDetectInternal(
077            detector,
078            img.dataAddr(),
079            img.rows(),
080            img.cols(),
081            doPoseEstimation,
082            tagWidth,
083            fx,
084            fy,
085            cx,
086            cy,
087            nIters);
088  }
089}
